text:
Supplement #6. 1st quarter, 1957 offering - 2
Dateline Europe (57-2)
You will recall that programs four and five were sent with Issue #6 due to their
late arrival here. Now, programs six (6) and seven (7) are being sent with Issue
#7, There will be no shipment of this series with Issue #8.
Since through the fault of no one the shipment of these programs has been held up,
we are hereby notifying all stations that delivery of these programs will be
irregular, such as was the case with Graham Hovey's LETTER FROM ITALY. However, we
will keep you informed as to when programs are being sent to you.
*###**#**# *
ADDITIONAL OPENING AND CLOSING STATEMENTS
a#*###*#####
The French Theatre (57-10B)

Reel 1:
OPEN: Music
CLOSE: ”....psychological study.”
Reel 2:
OPEN: Music
CLOSE: This is the NAEB Radio Network

Reel 1:
OPEN: Misic
CLOSE: Music
Reel 2:
OPEN: ”A Montmorillon, petite ville...”
CLOSE: This is the NAEB Radio Network.
Program 11 - Issue 11
Reel 1:
OPEN: Music
CLOSE: ”Qu’est-ce que vous etes, vous?” (Male voice)
Reel 2:
OPEN: ”Je suis bigame.”
CLOSE: This is the NAEB Radio Network
